EmailTemplate.name: Password Expiration Reminder Template
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for sending password expiration reminder to the users. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: approvalSet
Argument.Description: The ApprovalSet object contained in the workflow.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

EmailTemplate.Subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Password Expiration
EmailTemplate.Body:
You are receiving this message because one or more of your accounts has a password that is about to expire. Please change the password for the accounts below, within the specified number of days to prevent being locked out.

Please change the password for the following account(s):

    #foreach ($Item in $alertApps)
  • $Item
    • #end
